title: RHOSLC Met Gala! RHOD Trailer! The Bachelorette Wedding Photos! Kohl's Detour!

description:
Download and play Snood now! h​ttps://apps.apple.com/us/app/snood/id878752504 

NEW Limited Everything Iconic holiday merch at EverythingIconic.Store !!!


Danny starts the show with a Kohl's detour, then chats about the Real Housewives of Dallas trailer, which features lots of PPE comedy. On Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, Mary throws an unhinged met gala with beta fish and BossLady journals. Finally, Danny dives into The Bachelorette, which saw Tayshia on a date doing wedding photos, some nude art, and Bennett giving away his used socks.


PS Subscribe to Danny's spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, which is out now!


Detour

RHOD Trailer Recap: 11:30ish

RHOSLC Recap: 18:05ish

Bachelorette Recap: 43:05ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
